Articles.Content: i have tried to download attachments but all that pops up is a blank window. plz help;.;

Moved to The Forum Forum.

Attachments do not work. They have been disabled since the forum moved to vBulletin. If you want to put something in your post, you'll have to use an external host such as imgur for images (e.g. [noparse][/noparse]) or dropbox for other files.

Attachments on old posts moved over from the old forum won't work either.
